mutants.code:
def lastSubstring(s: str):
    n = len(s)
    max_ch = max(s)
    indices = [i for (i, ch) in enumerate(s) if ch != max_ch]
    substrings = [s[i:] for i in indices]
    max_substring = max(substrings)
    return (max_substring, s.rfind(max_substring))
